members.name: stateCode

constantValues: Shows whether the goal is open, completed, or canceled. Completed and canceled goals are read-only and can't be edited.

members.name: goalStartDate

constantValues: Enter the date and time when the period for tracking the goal begins.

members.description: Enter the date and time when the period for tracking the goal begins.

members.name: goalEndDate

constantValues: Enter the date when the goal ends.

members.description: Enter the date when the goal ends.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

constantValues: Choose the user or team responsible for meeting the goal.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Choose the user or team responsible for meeting the goal.

selectedTypeAttribute.name: idType

constantValues: The name of the entity linked by goalOwnerId

selectedTypeAttribute.description: The name of the entity linked by goalOwnerId

foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

constantValues: Choose a parent goal if the current goal is a child goal. This sets up a parent-child relationship for reporting and analytics.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Choose a parent goal if the current goal is a child goal. This sets up a parent-child relationship for reporting and analytics.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

constantValues: Choose the local currency for the record to make sure budgets are reported in the correct currency.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Choose the local currency for the record to make sure budgets are reported in the correct currency.

members.name: exchangeRate

constantValues: Shows the conversion rate of the record's currency. The exchange rate is used to convert all money fields in the record from the local currency to the system's default currency.

members.description: Shows the conversion rate of the record's currency. The exchange rate is used to convert all money fields in the record from the local currency to the system's default currency.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

constantValues: Choose the metric for the goal. This metric determines how the goal is tracked.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Choose the metric for the goal. This metric determines how the goal is tracked.

members.name: treeId

constantValues: Unique identifier of the goal tree.

members.description: Unique identifier of the goal tree.

members.name: depth

constantValues: Depth of the goal in the tree.

members.description: Depth of the goal in the tree.

members.name: stretchTargetMoney

constantValues: Select stretch target (money) of the goal to define a higher or difficult level of goal than the usual ones.

members.description: Select stretch target (money) of the goal to define a higher or difficult level of goal than the usual ones.

members.name: stretchTargetMoneyBase

constantValues: Shows the stretch target (money) in base currency to indicate a higher or difficult level of goal than the usual ones.

members.description: Shows the stretch target (money) in base currency to indicate a higher or difficult level of goal than the usual ones.

members.name: stretchTargetDecimal

constantValues: Select a stretch target (decimal) of the goal to define a higher or difficult level of goal than the usual ones.

members.description: Select a stretch target (decimal) of the goal to define a higher or difficult level of goal than the usual ones.

members.name: stretchTargetInteger

constantValues: Select the stretch target (integer) of the goal to define a higher or difficult level of goal than the usual ones.

members.description: Select the stretch target (integer) of the goal to define a higher or difficult level of goal than the usual ones.

members.name: targetMoney

constantValues: Select a goal target (money) to track a monetary amount such as revenue from a product.

members.description: Select a goal target (money) to track a monetary amount such as revenue from a product.

members.name: targetMoneyBase

constantValues: Shows the goal target of the money type in base currency.

members.description: Shows the goal target of the money type in base currency.

members.name: targetDecimal

constantValues: Select a goal target of the decimal type to use for tracking data that include partial numbers, such as pounds sold of a product sold by weight.

members.description: Select a goal target of the decimal type to use for tracking data that include partial numbers, such as pounds sold of a product sold by weight.

members.name: targetInteger

constantValues: Select a goal target of the integer type to use for tracking anything countable in whole numbers, such as units sold.

members.description: Select a goal target of the integer type to use for tracking anything countable in whole numbers, such as units sold.

members.name: actualMoney

constantValues: Shows the actual value (Money type) achieved towards the target as of the last rolled-up date. This field appears when the metric type of the goal is Amount and the amount data type is Money.

members.description: Shows the actual value (Money type) achieved towards the target as of the last rolled-up date. This field appears when the metric type of the goal is Amount and the amount data type is Money.

members.name: actualMoneyBase

constantValues: Shows the actual value (money type) in base currency to track goal results against the target.

members.description: Shows the actual value (money type) in base currency to track goal results against the target.

members.name: customRollupFieldMoney

constantValues: Indicates a placeholder rollup field for a money value to track a third category of results other than actuals and in-progress results.

members.description: Indicates a placeholder rollup field for a money value to track a third category of results other than actuals and in-progress results.

members.name: customRollupFieldMoneyBase

constantValues: Indicates a placeholder rollup field for a money value in base currency to track a third category of results other than actuals and in-progress results.

members.description: Indicates a placeholder rollup field for a money value in base currency to track a third category of results other than actuals and in-progress results.

members.name: inProgressMoney

constantValues: Shows the in-progress value (money) against the target. This value could contribute to a goal, but is not counted yet as actual.

members.description: Shows the in-progress value (money) against the target. This value could contribute to a goal, but is not counted yet as actual.

members.name: inProgressMoneyBase

constantValues: Shows the in-progress value (money) in base currency to track goal results against the target.

members.description: Shows the in-progress value (money) in base currency to track goal results against the target.

members.name: actualDecimal

constantValues: Shows the actual value (Decimal type) achieved towards the target as of the last rolled-up date. This field appears when the metric type of the goal is Amount and the amount data type is Decimal.

members.description: Shows the actual value (Decimal type) achieved towards the target as of the last rolled-up date. This field appears when the metric type of the goal is Amount and the amount data type is Decimal.

members.name: customRollupFieldDecimal

constantValues: Indicates a placeholder rollup field for a decimal value to track a third category of results other than actuals and in-progress results.

members.description: Indicates a placeholder rollup field for a decimal value to track a third category of results other than actuals and in-progress results.

members.name: inProgressDecimal

constantValues: Shows the in-progress value (decimal) against the target. This value could contribute to a goal, but is not counted yet as actual.

members.description: Shows the in-progress value (decimal) against the target. This value could contribute to a goal, but is not counted yet as actual.

members.name: actualInteger

constantValues: Shows the actual value (integer) achieved towards the target as of the last rolled-up date. This field appears when the metric type of the goal is Amount or Count and the amount data type is Integer.

members.description: Shows the actual value (integer) achieved towards the target as of the last rolled-up date. This field appears when the metric type of the goal is Amount or Count and the amount data type is Integer.

members.name: customRollupFieldInteger

constantValues: Indicates a placeholder rollup field for an integer value to track a third category of results other than actuals and in-progress results.

members.description: Indicates a placeholder rollup field for an integer value to track a third category of results other than actuals and in-progress results.

members.name: inProgressInteger

constantValues: Shows the in-progress value (integer) against the target. This value could contribute to a goal, but is not counted yet as actual.

members.description: Shows the in-progress value (integer) against the target. This value could contribute to a goal, but is not counted yet as actual.

members.name: percentage

constantValues: Shows the percentage achieved against the target goal.

members.description: Shows the percentage achieved against the target goal.

members.name: isFiscalPeriodGoal

constantValues: Select whether the goal period is a fiscal period or custom period.

members.description: Select whether the goal period is a fiscal period or custom period.

members.name: considerOnlyGoalOwnersRecords

constantValues: Select whether only the goal owner's records, or all records, should be rolled up for goal results.

members.description: Select whether only the goal owner's records, or all records, should be rolled up for goal results.

members.name: lastRolledupDate

constantValues: Shows the date and time when the goal was last rolled up. The date and time are displayed in the time zone selected in Microsoft Dynamics 365 options.

members.description: Shows the date and time when the goal was last rolled up. The date and time are displayed in the time zone selected in Microsoft Dynamics 365 options.

members.description: Target value of the goal.

members.name: computedTargetAsOfTodayMoney

constantValues: Shows the expected amount for actual value (money type) against the target goal as of the current date.

members.name: computedTargetAsOfTodayMoneyBase

constantValues: Shows the expected amount in base currency for actual value (money type) against the target goal as of the current date.

members.name: computedTargetAsOfTodayInteger

members.name: isOverride

constantValues: Indicates whether the values of system rollup fields can be updated.

members.description: Indicates whether the values of system rollup fields can be updated.

members.name: isOverridden

constantValues: Select whether the system rollup fields are updated. If set to Yes, the next system rollup will not update the values of the rollup fields with the system calculated values.
